field.label: Transport
field.help: Add a Transport to this endpoint.
field.hint: Set the Transport of the Endpoint

field.label: AoRs
field.hint: Set the AoRs of the Endpoint

field.label: 100Rel
field.help: Allow support for RFC3262 provisional ACK tags

field.label: Disallow
field.help: Media Codec's to disallow. Default: all. Select 'all' or a combination of a_mu,adpcm,alaw,g722,g726,g729a,gsm,ilbc,lpc10,opus,silk,siren7,siren14,speex,ulaw

field.label: Allow
field.help: Media Codec's to allow. Default: ulaw. Select 'all' or a combination of a_mu,adpcm,alaw,g722,g726,g729a,gsm,ilbc,lpc10,opus,silk,siren7,siren14,speex,ulaw

field.label: From Domain
field.help: Domain to use in From header for requests to this endpoint. (e.g., 169.254.69.71, sip.example.com)

field.label: Outbound Proxy
field.help: Proxy through which to send requests, a full SIP URI must be provided. (e.g., sip:proxy.example.com, sips:169.254.69.71)

field.label: Direct Media
field.help: Determines whether media may flow directly between endpoints
